thread.title: Lonely the Brave to play Southampton on European tour
thread.title_full: Lonely the Brave to play Southampton on European tour

title: Lonely the Brave to play Southampton on European tour
text:
0 comments 
With their special edition debut album, The Day’s War - Victory Edition, out now and the fan-favourite single Control gaining momentum, Lonely The Brave announce details of their European headline November tour that will see them play shows in Britain, Ireland, Germany, Belgium and Holland. 
Discussing the tour, the band said: “It's been a while since we went out on a headline run so we really can't wait to get back out there and play these shows! 
"It’ll be a chance to really celebrate the last couple of years and songs from the The Day’s War but also a chance to play our fans a few of the new ones we’ve been working on and are excited to record for album two. 
"We’re also proud to be bringing Black Peaks out with us - they're one of the most exciting British bands we've heard in a long time. We’re looking forward to putting on the best show we can for the fans.” Share article 
Lonely The Brave play Talking Heads, Southampton on November 23.
